title: The Principal Developer
keywords: soft skills, senior developer skills, principal developer skills, leadership for developers, how to become a software architect, how to become a team lead, becoming a technical leader
metaDescription: The Principal Developer is invitation-only, two-day long masterclass for senior developers, team leaders and software architects. We build traits, habits and skills that technical people need to succeed at senior-level positions.
description: The Principal Developer is invitation-only, two-day long masterclass for senior developers, team leaders and software architects. We build traits, habits and skills that technical people need to succeed at senior-level positions.
